name: Truck Simulator. Ultimate Construction Lorry Driving Simulation
name_original: Truck Simulator. Ultimate Construction Lorry Driving Simulation
description:
Construction Truck Simulator : The life on a construction site is not easy. There are many objects to look out for. The rugged trucks, The heavy loaders, mass transports all are part of the game.
Explore various parts of the cities and fulfil your contract as a construction truck driver.
How you many levels can you clear?

How to Play:-

Tap your iPhone/iPad on right side to drive / brake.
Tap on left to control steering.
